processors.name: units_summary_1
processors.description: Compute autocorrelograms for a units table in an NWB file
processors.label: units_summary_1

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input NWB file in .nwb or .nwb.lindi.tar format

parameters.name: units_path
parameters.description: Path to the units table in the NWB file

parameters.name: correlogram_window_size_msec
parameters.description: Correlogram window size in milliseconds

parameters.name: correlogram_bin_size_msec
parameters.description: Correlogram bin size in milliseconds

processors.name: ephys_summary_1
processors.description: Compute summary information for an electrophysiology dataset
processors.label: ephys_summary_1

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input NWB file in .nwb or .nwb.lindi.tar format

parameters.name: electrical_series_path
parameters.description: Path to the electrical series object in the NWB file

parameters.name: segment_start_time_sec
parameters.description: Start time of segment to analyze in seconds

parameters.name: segment_duration_sec
parameters.description: Duration of segment to analyze in seconds

processors.name: avi_to_mp4
processors.description: Convert an .avi file to an .mp4 file
processors.label: avi_to_mp4

parameters.name: duration_sec
parameters.description: The duration of the output video in seconds

processors.name: ephys_preprocess
processors.description: Run preprocessing on an electrophysiology dataset
processors.label: ephys_preprocess

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input NWB file in .nwb or .nwb.lindi.tar format

parameters.name: electrical_series_path
parameters.description: Path to the electrical series object in the NWB file

processors.name: prepare_ephys_spike_sorting_dataset
processors.description: Run preprocessing on an electrophysiology dataset in preparation for spike sorting
processors.label: prepare_ephys_spike_sorting_dataset

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input NWB file in .nwb or .nwb.lindi.tar format

parameters.name: electrical_series_path
parameters.description: Path to the electrical series object in the NWB file

parameters.name: duration_sec
parameters.description: Duration of the recording to process, or 0 to process the entire recording

parameters.name: electrode_indices
parameters.description: List of electrode indices to process

parameters.name: freq_min
parameters.description: Minimum frequency for bandpass filter

parameters.name: freq_max
parameters.description: Maximum frequency for bandpass filter

parameters.name: compression_ratio
parameters.description: Target compression ratio

parameters.name: output_electrical_series_name
parameters.description: Name of the output electrical series object

parameters.name: electrical_series_path
parameters.description: Path to the electrical series object in the NWB file

parameters.name: output_units_name
parameters.description: Name of the output units object

parameters.name: detect_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold for spike detection

parameters.name: channel_radius
parameters.description: Channel radius for spike detection

processors.name: spike_sorting_post_processing
processors.description: Run post processing on an electrophysiology dataset after spike sorting and add columns to the units table
processors.label: spike_sorting_post_processing

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input NWB file in .nwb or .nwb.lindi.tar format

parameters.name: electrical_series_path
parameters.description: Path to the electrical series object in the NWB file

parameters.name: units_path
parameters.description: Path to the units object in the NWB file

parameters.name: n_jobs
parameters.description: Number of jobs to run in parallel

parameters.name: metric_names
parameters.description: List of metric names to compute
